thread.title: Hilary Duff Shares Sexy #TBT Photo of Costa Rican Vacation With Boyfriend Matthew Koma: 'Take Me Back'
thread.title_full: Hilary Duff Shares Sexy #TBT Photo of Costa Rican Vacation With Boyfriend Matthew Koma: 'Take Me Back'

author: Latifah Muhammad
title: Hilary Duff Shares Sexy #TBT Photo of Costa Rican Vacation With Boyfriend Matthew Koma: 'Take Me Back'
text: Hilary Duff Shares Sexy #TBT Photo of Costa Rican Vacation With Boyfriend Matthew Koma: 'Take Me Back' by Latifah Muhammad 4:00 PM PST, February 23, 2017 Photo: Getty Images It looks like Hilary Duff is ready to go back to Costa Rica! On Thursday, Duff shared a sexy throwback snap from her tropical getaway with boyfriend Matthew Koma , captioned "Take me back with him." A post shared by Hilary Duff (@hilaryduff) on Feb 23, 2017 at 2:20pm PST MORE: Hilary Duff: 'I Feel Like I Was Judged for Having a Baby Too Soon' Duff and Koma were linked following her split from ex-boyfriend Jason Walsh in December, but she wasn't exactly looking for a relationship at the time. The former Disney star, who shares a 4-year-old son, Luca, with ex-husband and NHL star Mike Comrie, opened up about her dating habits in Cosmopolitan's February issue. "I've never been a good dater," Duff admitted to the magazine. "I meet, like, one person a year that I'm maybe attracted to. I never want to be that girl who's desperate to find a mate." See more below.
